German Credit Data

Source: R/data_sets.R
credit.Rd

Data on credit worthiness.

Usage

credit

Format

credit

A data frame with 1000 rows and 14 columns:

Class

Credit worthiness as 'Good' or Bad'.

Age

Age of person.

NumberExistingCredits

Number of existing credits.

Personal

Sex and relationship status of person.

CheckingAccountStatus

Status of the checking account.

CreditHistory

Status of credit history.

Purpose

Reason for requesting credit.

SavingsAccountBonds

Amount of Savings account bonds.

EmploymentDuration

Length of current employment.

OtherDebtorsGuarantors

Information on if there is a guarantor.

Property

Type of property.

OtherInstallmentPlans

Information on other installment plans.

Housing

Status of thier house.

Job

Type of job.

Source

UCI Machine Learning Repository

References

Kuhn, M. (2008). Building Predictive Models in R Using the caret Package. Journal of Statistical Software, 28(5), 1–26. https://doi.org/10.18637/jss.v028.i05
